SHR NuclearPleomorphismScoreVS ValueSet

Value set containing the scores for nuclear pleomorphism.

name: NuclearPleomorphismScoreVS
title: SHR NuclearPleomorphismScoreVS ValueSet
publisher: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative
description: Value set containing the scores for nuclear pleomorphism.

concept.display: Nuclear pleomorphism: moderate increase in size, etc (score = 2)
Nuclear pleomorphism: marked variation in size, nucleoli, chromatin clumping, etc (score = 3)
